alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 730 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Palm Beach to 7 miles northwest of Lion Country Safari Park. Movement was northeast around 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Tequesta, Juno Beach, Royal Palm Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Cloud Lake, Palm Beach International Airport, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle and Royal Palm Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
